title: Approach Velocity and Ingenious Hunter are in the wrong Keystone groups.
body:
The Domination Keystone is for burst damage and "**target access**" so why isn't **Approach velocity** (increases your speed towards enemies you slow) in the Domination group instead of in the Inspiration Keystone group? 

**Ingenious Hunter** (lowers active item cooldown) would be more appropriate in the "**creative tools and rule bending**" Inspiration keystone and used with supports who often build redemption, shurelyas, Locket of Iron, or twin shadows. 

Anyone else think these should be in opposite Keystones?

replies.body:
Approach velocity also allows you to move faster towards impaired allies which makes it more of a utility rune. 
Ingenious hunter also requires you to take bounties in-order to benefit from the cool down reduction bounty system makes it more of a Domination rune.

You forgot to mention the parts of the abilities that make them part of the path they are in.

They could modify already existing runes to be added to additional paths but it seems they would need to make sure balancing for stacking types of runes doesn't get out of hand. Wouldn't mind if they added some copies into different paths though.
Also synergy of Predator and Ingenious hunter is pretty obvious, they should be kept in the same tree.
What about the synergy of Glacial Augment and Ingenious Hunter?  I want super low cooldown aoe slows on my items.

There's tons of problems with the keystones.
I even asked Riot devs last year at pax and the only thing they said was keystone paths shouldn't limit your bonuses too much (which is bullshit imo)

If keystones made sense the bonus healing rune from defense tree would be in sorcery or inspiration.
The tenacity option in Precision tree would be in defense tree.
Almost 1/3 of the runes are in the wrong tree.

I'd stick it in inspiration, then tanks and supports can get the rune without sacrificing beef/utility (if we stuck it into sorcery tanks would have to opt into that which is very sub optimal, like it currently is with it in domination for supports). 
Would then replace that random final rune in the resolve tree (the one that isn't bonus HP and bonus healing, y'know the one that no one uses?) and replace with a courage of the colossus copy (or make courage a primary rune and stick the tank/support rune in the final row).
